This is a repository of niche analysis for disjoint Amazon and Atlantic forest birds.

Steps:

1) compiled and cleaning occurrence data for species.

    Here we use rocc workflow ( https://github.com/saramortara/rocc) and CoordinateCleaner (https://github.com/ropensci/CoordinateCleaner)
